articles.title: JetBlue announces a deal to buy Spirit Airlines. Fares could surge - CNN
articles.description: JetBlue Airways on Thursday announced it would purchase Spirit Airlines, a combination that would create America's fifth-largest airline.
articles.content:

articles.author: Benjamin Mueller
articles.title: In Rural America, Covid Hits Black and Hispanic People Hardest - The New York Times
articles.description: At the peak of the Omicron wave, Covid killed Black Americans in rural areas at a rate roughly 34 percent higher than it did white people.
articles.content: Black people have also kept masking at greater rates, national polls indicate, a split that rural residents said was still on sharp display. Its more the Black who wear their masks, said Roy Lee McKe… [+1586 chars]

articles.description: The Biden administration has offered a deal to Russia aimed at bringing home WNBA star Brittney Griner and another jailed American Paul Whelan, Secretary of State Antony Blinken said Wednesday.
